name: kavita
description: Kavita is a self hosted digital library for manga, comics, light novels and books. It supports reading progress, collections, metadata and multiple users with a rich responsive reader optimized for various devices.
features: Multi-Format Support: Read manga, comics, books, and light novels in various formats. Unified library for all reading material.
Web Reader: Built-in responsive reader with page-by-page and continuous scroll modes. Read comfortably on any device.
Reading Progress: Automatic progress tracking with resume from where you left off. Never lose your place.
Library Organization: Automatic series detection, metadata fetching, and collection management. Keep library organized effortlessly.
User Management: Multiple user accounts with individual reading progress and preferences. Share library with family safely.
Collections: Create custom collections and reading lists to organize content. Curate your reading experience.
OPDS Support: Access library through OPDS-compatible apps and readers. Use your preferred reading app.
Metadata Editing: Manually edit series information, covers, and metadata. Maintain accurate library details.
Reading Statistics: Track reading time, pages read, and completion rates. Understand your reading habits.
Smart Lists: Automatically generated lists for recently added, in progress, and recommended content. Discover what to read next.
Search & Filter: Advanced search with filters for genres, formats, and reading status. Find content quickly.
Dark Mode: Eye-friendly dark theme for comfortable night reading. Reduce eye strain.
